title: Elementary experiments in the chemistry of water
brief_description: Demonstrates the following elementary experiments which illustrate the chemistry of water. 1. Exploding one part of oxygen with two parts of hydrogen to form water. 2. Passing an electric current through pure water and salt solution. 3. Burning hydrogen to form water vapour. 4. Electrolysis of water.
